definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: Luckily, it's very straight-forward and takes less than half an hour.
sentences.chinese: 幸運的是，這是非常直接的，並考慮不到一個半小時。

sentences.english: The High Line is almost two–and-one-half-kilometers long.
sentences.chinese: 高線是近兩年一個半公里長。

sentences.english: He trained for one-and-a-half hours with the reserves in a very competitive situation.
sentences.chinese: 他在預備隊進行了一個半小時高對抗的訓練。

sentences.english: Toshio leaned down to look at photos in a plastic album half-buried in the mud before realizing they were of another family.
sentences.chinese: 彎下腰看一個半埋在泥裏的塑料照相框。

sentences.english: Mr Lee spends about one-and-a-half hours a day updating his own microblog.
sentences.chinese: 李先生每天用一個半小時左右的時間來更新他的微博。

sentences.english: Transfer one hemisphere,the patient wakes up.
sentences.chinese: 移植一個半腦的時候，病人也會醒來。

sentences.english: you would probably spend at least an hour or an hour and a half on each floor.
sentences.chinese: 每層樓你大概要看一個或者一個半小時。

sentences.english: Then they removed the cancer. The operation took only a half hour.
sentences.chinese: 這次手術只用時一個半小時。

sentences.english: We show that all fuzzy congruence relations on a semigroup is a lattice.
sentences.chinese: 證明了一個半羣上所有模糊同餘關係作成一個格。

sentences.english: It took Mabel nearly one and a half hours to choose a suit of proper clothes .
sentences.chinese: 梅布爾花了一個半小時的時間選了一套合適的衣服。

sentences.english: My dad was an athlete who played semi-pro soccer.
sentences.chinese: 我的父親是一個半職業的足球運動員。

sentences.english: He is a semi-invalid now and can't get about as wall as he used to.
sentences.chinese: 他現在是一個半殘廢的人，不能象過去那樣走動。

sentences.english: And there's the ropery in a building that's a half-kilometer long.
sentences.chinese: 同時還有一個建築，是一個半公里長的羅佩裏。

sentences.english: In the last 1.5 months, Trojan dropped four thousand or five thousand Yuan per ton.
sentences.chinese: 最近一個半月內，累計每噸下跌了四五千元。

sentences.english: After having to wait nearly an hour and a half, she was foaming.
sentences.chinese: 等了將近一個半小時之後，她氣得七竅生煙。

sentences.english: Under the table was lying a half-conscious young man.
sentences.chinese: 在桌子下面躺着一個半昏迷的年輕人。
